summary: San Francisco is a little city, where you keep running into the same 6 people, here 5 around 30 y.o. and a cougar on the prowl for young women, all going in and out of relationships.
cast: Jon Bon Jovi|Penelope Ann Miller|Joe Bellan|Robert Elross|Josh Charles|Annabella Sciorra|Peter Gardiner|JoBeth Williams|Joanna Going|Anna Getty|Stacy Haiduk|Meeka|Lloyd Booker|Orvis Slack|Christopher Greene|Timothy Roberts|Gail Washington
title: Little City
